评论详情: I never take time to write reviews and I’m a total designer snob but decided to get these (for serval from this store) and I’m blown away. These feel like all my high end pillow cases. Make sure you use a size larger down insert and chop away!
I wanted some contrast for my sectional and a mix of something else. Well House of Valentina did the shopping for me and I love it. She finds great merchandise on Amazon!
The Croker Horse throw pillow cover looks beautiful on my classical brown Queen Anne winged chair.

The pillow print is cute, but the zipper is too short and it is very difficult to get an insert into the cover . I probably will not buy more of this brand. The zipper length is 13”, so it’s tough to get an insert into the 20” cover. Disappointing.

I have bought at least 15 different pillows covers from Amazon and these are by far the best of them all. The material is substantial and the stitching is well done and consistent. The design is very reflective of Hermes. The zipper pull is a tad wimpy for the weight of the fabric (I was afraid I might pull it off when zipping the cover closed) but it was fine and the small size of the pull is a benefit when the pillows are in use - who would want a giant zipper pull hanging off the pillow, after all. I suspect the fabric may not wear terribly well so I wouldn’t use them in a place where they will be thrown around, squished and resquished, daily but I wouldn’t do that with any fine pillow. These pillow covers are much more about style and the style is perfect! I STRONGLY recommend these and the other complimentary pillow covers from the same seller - they’re fabulous.
I bought 2 sets in different colors

评论概述: Classy, great tan and crean color
评论详情: Looks great on my Ethan Allen cream couch. Modern yet traditional design. Nice quality (maybe not for kids and animals) and no complaints.
This pill cover is simply beautiful. The quality is excellent I  simply love it.

These pillow covers look beautiful. However, if you are planning to actually use them for something other than decoration…DON’T. I have only been using them for a little over a month and they are starting to show serious wear. For the price of these covers…look elsewhere!!!!
This is a very nice pillow and I’m glad I ordered it!
Love this pillow cover .. great quality, fast shipping.  Would order again.

So lovely that I ordered a second one. This was well worth the weight as it came from America. It’s such a pity that we don’t get such beautiful covers Hair in England. It’s about time we imported more from America.
